attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no place in the modern world for a tax to watch tv. there is so much choice these days that this antiquated tax is an insult to fair trade and to the right to choose by ordinary people.  The BBC have an unfair advantage over other broadcasters and it is time for it to stop!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
